original: Tāya tāyeva natthi dukkhassantakiriyā, natthi vaṭṭupacchedo, natthi anupādāparinibbānanti?
Tāya tāyeva natthi dukkhassantakiriyā, natthi vaṭṭupacchedo, natthi anupādāparinibbānanti?
Tassa tasseva natthi dukkhassantakiriyā, natthi vaṭṭupacchedo, natthi anupādāparinibbānanti?
Rūpaṁ parinipphannaṁ, rūpassa bhedo atthi, antaradhānaṁ atthīti?
Maraṇaṁ parinipphannaṁ, maraṇassa bhedo atthi, antaradhānaṁ atthīti?
Viññāṇaṁ parinipphannaṁ, viññāṇassa bhedo atthi, antaradhānaṁ atthīti?
Maraṇaṁ parinipphannaṁ, maraṇassa bhedo atthi, antaradhānaṁ atthīti?
Anusayā abyākatā, ahetukā, cittavippayuttā, aññāṇe vigate ñāṇī, ñāṇaṁ cittavippayuttaṁ,
yattha sadde ñāṇaṁ pavattati, iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṁ tiṭṭheyya, cittasantati
